## Importing Data

oil_data <- read_csv("../Data/cleaned_training.csv")

## XGBoost Model

```{r}
train_X <- as.matrix(oil_data[,-17])
train_y <- as.matrix(oil_data$OilPeakRate)
xgboost_model <- xgboost(params=list(verbosity=0, learning_rate=0.1, objective="reg:squarederror", 
                                     eval_metric = "rmse"),
                         data=as.matrix(oil_data[,-17]), label=as.matrix(oil_data[,17]),
                         nrounds=35)
```
